Name: Controllers Battery Indicator
About the game: A simple and handy utility for monitoring the charge of Xbox controllers. In time will warn about the discharge of the battery. Doesn’t interfere with the gameplay. Doesn’t CPU load. Track battery capacity and predict long-term resource.
